thread.title: SPOILER: EastEnders cast spotted filming Sylvie Carter's funeral WITHOUT Danny Dyer
thread.title_full: SPOILER: EastEnders cast spotted filming Sylvie Carter's funeral WITHOUT Danny Dyer

author: Peter Lloyd
title: SPOILER: EastEnders cast spotted filming Sylvie Carter's funeral WITHOUT Danny Dyer
text:
Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
There is never a shortage of drama within the parameters of Albert Square. 
But fans of EastEnders fans can expect particularly emotional scenes in the coming weeks - after key members of the cast were spotted filming the funeral of Sylvie Carter. 
Together, members of the Carter family - including Tina, Johnny and Shirley - were seen on location in North West London. They were joined by Billie and Jay, plus Natalie Cassidy's Sonia. 
Interestingly, however, there was no sign of either Danny Dyer or Kellie Bright, who are both on a break from the long-running BBC show. EastEnders cast-members were seen filming the funeral of Sylvie Carter (Photo: BBC) Despite being a key cast-member, Danny Dyer was absent (Photo: BBC) Read More Danny Dyer 'has had meetings with EastEnders' over show comeback 
The plot-hole is a substantial one given that Sylvie turned out to be Mick’s grandmother when Shirley was revealed to be his real mum. 
But, despite this, images showed the rest of the cast trying to discreetly film scenes in order to keep details of the character's death top secret. 
B osses have so far been tight-lipped over whether Sylvie's death is linked to her Alzheimer’s or caused by something else altogether. 
Linda Marlowe, 76, joined in 2014 to play the red-headed mother (gran) to Danny Dyer ’s Mick plus Tina (Luisa Bradshaw-White) and Shirley (Linda Henry). 
It transpired she had walked out on the family, abandoning her kids until she reappeared needing their help. The character was recently revealed to be Mick's grandmother (Photo: BBC) Bosses have been tight-lipped about the character's death (Photo: BBC) Fans are keen for the handsome screen star to return (Photo: BBC) Read More Danny Dyer gets upstaged by train as EastEnders viewers blast soap for 'worst CGI ever' 
She arrived in Albert Square having annoyed residents at her care home and kind-hearted Tina vowed she would be looked after. 
But Mick chucked Sylvie out after discovering Shirley was his mum and learning she pushed Shirley down the stairs when she was pregnant with him to try to make her miscarry. 
Earlier this week, members of the Carter family were spotted filming her funeral at Hendon Crematorium in North West London. Like us on Facebook
